ViewObject.Name: PopulateContractLinesVO
ViewObject.SelectList: XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.ACTIVE_FLAG, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CONTRACT_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CONTRACT_LINE_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CREATED_BY, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CREATION_DATE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.FUEL_OPTION, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.HIRING_BASIS_RULE_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.LINE_NUM, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.LINE_VALUE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.MASTER_CONTRACT_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.MASTER_CONTRACT_LINE_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.MIN_CHARGE_UNIT, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.MIN_CHARGE_VALUE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.MOBILIZATION_REQUIRED, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.OFF_HIRE_DATE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.ON_HIRE_DATE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.OPERATOR_OPTION, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.OT1_RATE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.OT2_RATE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.PARENT_CONTRACT_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.PARENT_CONTRACT_LINE_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.QUANTITY, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.REFERENCE_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.REFERENCE_LINE_ID, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.REFERENCE_LINE_NUM, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.REMARKS, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.RENTAL_TYPE, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.SHIFT, XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.STANDARD_RATE, (select meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t where lookup_type = 'XXADS_RENTAL_TYPE' and application_id = 13 and lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.RENTAL_TYPE) AS TRANSRENTALTYPE, (case when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.rental_type <> 'O' then (select asset_category from xxads_asset_category_t where category_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.rental_type = 'O' then (select emp_category_code from xxads_emp_category_t where emp_category_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) end) AS TRANSCATEGORY, (case when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.rental_type <> 'O' then (select description from xxads_asset_category_t where category_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.rental_type = 'O' then (select description from xxads_emp_category_t where emp_category_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) end) AS TRANSCATEGORYDESCRIPTION, (select hiring_basis from XXADS_HIRING_BASIS_RULES_T where rule_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.HIRING_BASIS_RULE_ID) AS TRANSHIRINGBASIS, (select meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t where lookup_type = 'XXADS_SHIFT_TYPE' and application_id = 13 and lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.SHIFT) AS TRANSSHIFT, (case when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.OPERATOR_OPTION='W' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) AS TRANSOPERTORREQUIRED, (case when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.FUEL_OPTION='W' then 'Yes' else 'No' end) AS TRANSFUELREQUIRED, (XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.QUANTITY - (select count(*) from xxads_asset_allocation_dtls_t where allocation_line_id in (select line_id from xxads_asset_allocation_lines_t where contract_line_id =XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CONTRACT_line_ID))) AS TRANSQUANTITYREMAINING
ViewObject.Where: ( (XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.MASTER_CONTRACT_ID = :p_contract_id ) AND XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' and (XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.QUANTITY - (select count(*) from xxads_asset_allocation_dtls_t dt where allocation_line_id in (select line_id from xxads_asset_allocation_lines_t where master_contract_line_id =XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.MASTER_CONTRACT_line_ID) and not exists (select 'Y' from xxads_dr_lines_t dr, xxads_dr_header_t dh where dh.dr_id = dr.dr_id and dh.dr_status = 'C' and dr.allocation_detail_id = dt.allocation_detail_id))) > 0 and not exists (select 'Y' from xxads_asset_allocation_lines_t xaalt where xaalt.master_contract_line_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.MASTER_CONTRACT_LINE_ID and xaalt.allocation_id = :p_allocation_id))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransRentalType
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t where lookup_type = 'XXADS_RENTAL_TYPE' and application_id = 13 and lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.RENTAL_TYPE)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCategory
ViewAttribute.Expression: (case when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.rental_type <> 'O' then (select asset_category from xxads_asset_category_t where category_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.rental_type = 'O' then (select emp_category_code from xxads_emp_category_t where emp_category_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) end)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCategoryDescription
ViewAttribute.Expression: (case when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.rental_type <> 'O' then (select description from xxads_asset_category_t where category_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) when XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.rental_type = 'O' then (select description from xxads_emp_category_t where emp_category_id=XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CATEGORY_ID) end)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransShift
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t where lookup_type = 'XXADS_SHIFT_TYPE' and application_id = 13 and lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.SHIFT)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransQuantityRemaining
ViewAttribute.Expression: (XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.QUANTITY - (select count(*) from xxads_asset_allocation_dtls_t where allocation_line_id in (select line_id from xxads_asset_allocation_lines_t where contract_line_id =XxadsRentalContractLinesEO.CONTRACT_line_ID)))
